links.*: La Conexion Española de J.R.R. Tolkien
Poetry and Song in the works of J.R.R. Tolkien

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast#Tolkien Society tradition|Birthday Toast]].
* '''[[24 January|24]]''' - [[Ursula K. Le Guin]] dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 269]]'' is published.

==March==
* '''[[22 March|22]]''' - ''[[Pagan Saints in Middle-earth]]'' is published.
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 270]]'' is published.

==April==
* '''[[10 April|10]]''' - [[HarperCollins]] announce that ''[[The Fall of Gondolin]]'' will be published on [[30 August]] 2018.
* '''[[24 April|24]]''' - [[Robert Murray]] dies.
* '''[[30 April|30]]''' - ''[[Poetry and Song in the works of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.

==May==
* '''[[3 May|3]]''' - ''[[Beren and Lúthien]]'' is published in paperback.
* '''[[31 May|31]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit Facsimile Gift Edition]]'' is published in the [[wikipedia:United Kingdom|UK]]
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 271]]'' is published.

==June==
* '''[[1 June|1]]''' - [[Bodleian Library]]'s exhibition "Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth" begins. The companion books ''[[Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth]]'' and ''[[Tolkien: Treasures]]'' will also be published.
* '''[[5 June|5]]''' - ''Uncle Curro. J.R.R. Tolkien's Spanish Connection'' is published, a translation of ''[[La Conexion Española de J.R.R. Tolkien]]''.
* '''[[11 June|11]]''' - ''Where the Shadows Lie: A Jungian Interpretation of Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings'' is published.

==July==
* '''[[1 July|1]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]] Seminar at the Hilton, [[Leeds]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 272]]'' is published.

==August==

* '''[[30 August|30]] - ''[[The Fall of Gondolin]]'' is published.'''
* '''[[30 August|30]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2019]]'' is published.

==September==
* '''[[20 September|20]] - [[23 September|23]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2018]] at [http://www.sant.ox.ac.uk St Antony's College].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 273]]'' is published.

==October==
* '''[[4 October|4]]''' - ''[[A Middle-earth Traveller]]'' is published.
* '''[[28 October|28]]''' - [[Bodleian Library]]'s exhibition "Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth" ends.

==November==
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 274]]'' is published.

==?==
* '''?''' - American writer [[Rod Jellema]] dies.
